name: PMC-Suite
description:
The nation of Laguta is locked in fierce civil war. The government is locked in combat with two different rebel groups: a marxist uprising calling itself the Collective Army for the Liberation of Laguta (CALL) and a religious extremist group that western media poorly translates as the 'Bellicose Ecclesiarchs'. Meanwhile, GlobOil pokes and prods at the land in search of their next quarterly earnings report.

It is into this void that an up-and-coming PMC makes its entrance. Whether they choose to extinguish or fan the flames of civil war is entirely up to its executive.
